name: Runaway Russian - Mechanized
description:
This was the first ever game jam that we've ever done! Also our first real complete game. All art (accept for particle effect textures) was done during the jam. As well as all the voice acting was recorded during the jam as well.  

We had the theme effect our game two ways, first the out of control bear and second the helicopter with difficult to master controls .

If you encounter any issues, which I am sure there will be some feel free to contact me.

Thanks for checking out our very first game!
